name: 楊元森
objective: 本課程包含工程繪圖基本觀念與電腦輔助繪圖技能，從2D繪圖到3D空間觀念的基本圖學觀念，引導學生瞭解工程圖的原理與重要性，進而帶領學生操作電腦輔助繪圖軟體與3D視覺化呈現，並以工程案例，培養其對工程的素養與獲取相關證照的基本能力。
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction to Engineering Drawing
Week 2: Coordinate systems, lines, circles, printing
Week 3: Drawing with trimming, arc, fillet, chamfering, basic object editing, snapping.
Week 4: Drawing with extend, offset, stretch, rotate, and array.
Week 5: Mirror, text, dim, layer, scale.
Week 6: Orthographic projection, top view, front view, right view, isometric view.
Week 7: Day-off
Week 8: Orthographic projection, line types, line type scale, hatch
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Isometric view (ddrmodes, isoplane)
Week 11: off
Week 12: Exercises 
Week 13: Government Engineering Drawing Standards
Week 14: Exercises
Week 15: Engineering drawing of a simple hosue
Week 16: Engineering drawing of a house with windows
Week 17: Final project exercise 
Week 18: Final project
scorePolicy:
平時成績: 30%
期中考: 20%
期末專案: 50%
